title: Feature Request: Move to Folder
author: C4rb0n
body_snippet:
Could you please add the capability to right-click a connection (or folder), in the Connections list, and choose "Move to...," which would show a list of existing folders, including a bottom (or top of the list) option for "New Folder...."

Currently, trying to move a connection to a folder, where there is a long list of connections, is a laborious task of drag-scroll-dropping.

Thanks
